properties.name: Wembley Stadium
properties.description: Located in London, UK, Wembley Stadium is one of the most famous football stadiums in the world that also hosts large concerts.

properties.name: O2 Arena
properties.description: The O2 Arena, in Greenwich, London, is a state-of-the-art arena that hosts music concerts, sports events and more.

properties.name: Stade de France
properties.description: Located in Saint-Denis, a suburb of Paris, Stade de France is the national stadium of France, hosting football and rugby matches, as well as large concerts.

properties.name: AccorHotels Arena
properties.description: The AccorHotels Arena is an indoor sports arena and concert hall located in the neighborhood of Bercy, Paris, France.

properties.name: San Siro Stadium
properties.description: San Siro, also known as Stadio Giuseppe Meazza, is a football stadium in Milan, Italy, that also hosts big music events.

properties.name: Palau Sant Jordi
properties.description: Palau Sant Jordi is an indoor sporting arena and multi-purpose installation located in Barcelona, Spain.

properties.name: Wiener Stadthalle
properties.description: Located in Vienna, Austria, Wiener Stadthalle is a multi-purpose indoor arena and convention center.

properties.name: Olympiastadion
properties.description: Olympiastadion is a sports stadium in Berlin, Germany. It hosts football matches as well as large-scale music concerts.

properties.name: Royal Albert Hall
properties.description: The Royal Albert Hall is a concert hall on the northern edge of South Kensington, London. It is one of the UK's most treasured and distinctive buildings.

properties.name: Ziggo Dome
properties.description: The Ziggo Dome is a 17,000-seat multi-use indoor arena in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It is named after the Dutch cable TV provider Ziggo.
